mapper.select: SELECT inquiry_idx, member_nickname, code_idx, inquiry_title, inquiry_content, inquiry_regdate, inquiry_state FROM inquiry WHERE inquiry_idx = #{inquiry_idx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inquiry(inquiry_upidx, member_idx, code_idx,inquiry_title, inquiry_content, inquiry_state, inquiry_blind) VALUES(#{inquiry_idx},#{member_idx},#{code_idx},#{inquiry_title},#{inquiry_content},1,0)
mapper.update: UPDATE inquiry SET inquiry_state = 1 WHERE inquiry_idx = #{inquiry_idx}
